report.title: Record data for verification
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the verification 3 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id and o.deleted=false join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false left join samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false left join locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where co.id=#occurrence_id#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case substring(s.location_name from 1 for 3) when 'GR ' then 'Square (200m) ' || substring(s.location_name from '[0-9]+$') when 'SL ' then 'Section ' || substring(s.location_name from '[0-9]+$') else s.location_name end
